{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the new RNTCP guidelines, suspects of tuberculosis include confirmed extra-pulmonary tuberculosis patients with cough of 2 weeks or more, HIV-positive patients with cough of any duration, contacts of sputum positive tuberculosis patients with cough of any duration, and any individual having cough of duration 2 weeks or more. Therefore, the answer choice that is not a suspect of tuberculosis according to the new RNTCP guidelines is A. Confirmed extra-pulmonary tuberculosis patient with cough of 2 weeks or more.", "answer_choice": "A"}
